entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
